summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of CT Fidelis landing page. All priority WhatsApp links working correctly with updated phone number. Carousel drag functionality, scroll animations, and mobile responsiveness tested successfully.

ui_bugs.issue: Horizontal overflow on mobile (431px body width vs 375px viewport)

passed_tests: WhatsApp links with correct phone number (+55 31 9490-4574)
WhatsApp floating button visibility and functionality
Bidirectional scroll animations on audience cards
Mobile menu and mobile CTA button
Instagram button and footer Instagram link
All interactive elements clickable and functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor mobile responsive fix needed: reduce horizontal overflow on 375px viewport (body width 431px vs 375px viewport)
